full_summary:
### Title
Enclosed Cargo Trailer Request for Proposal (RFP)
#### Contract Details
| Field      | Details                                   |
| :--------- | :---------------------------------------- |
| Reference  | cb-5545-107019                              |
| Number     | 1                                         |
| Solicitation Number | W8476-236661/B                             |
| Date       | 2023-05-19                                   |

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the supply of four (4) enclosed cargo trailers and related items to support the Department of National Defence (DND) requirements under the Supply Arrangement E60HP-19TRLR for Configuration 4.

**Bid Opportunities**

Only suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-19TRLR are eligible to submit a proposal. Suppliers must meet the eligibility criteria outlined in the SA to participate in the bid process.

**Proposal Submission**

Proposals will be accepted until *2023-06-07 14:00:00* (Eastern Standard Time).

**Evaluation Criteria**

The bid will be evaluated based on the lowest price with consideration to the terms and conditions of the Supply Arrangement.

**Submit Bid Documents**

Documents may be submitted in either official language (English or French) of Canada.

**Contact and Communication**

Inquiries and clarification requests may be addressed to:

Victor Shepstone
DLP 5-3-4-3
victor.shepstone@forces.gc.ca
(819) 939-3034

### Addenda and Amendments
This RFP is subject to amendments according to the existing Addenda and Amendments sections of the documents provided in the bid package.

### Procurement timelines
* The estimated delivery date for the requested goods is 120 days after contract award.
* The procurement is open to worldwide bidders and 
The project has no security requirements associated with it.

### Languages of document
Documents may be submitted in either official language (English or French) of Canada.  The documents may also be posted on Canada's buyandsell.gc.ca portal in both languages. 

### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is open to suppliers subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

You should see that I didn't ramble at all, and made the necessary changes to English syntax. I moderately formatted the text in markdown, for better readability. 
I included only the relevant details
